name: Crew Neck Short Sleeve T-Shirt Uniqlo U
description: A stylish statement T-shirt. Meticulously designed for outstanding comfort. Get the men's collection and wear together as couple outfits!

name: AirSense Jacket (Ultra Light) Wool Like
description: Our incredibly lightweight, stretchy and quick-drying high-performance jacket. Also suitable for business settings. Wear it with AirSense Pants (Ultra Light) Wool Like as set-up items.

name: Rugger Striped Short Sleeve Polo (Regular)
description: A comfortable 100% cotton polo shirt. Attractive design that respects tradition.

name: AIRism UV Protection Mesh Hoodie
description: Mesh hoodie with an updated pocketable design. A handy and functional layer you can carry anywhere.

name: Smooth Jersey Lined Parka (Water-Repellent)
description: Updated with a chunky silhouette you can throw on. A more modern design that can be worn in any situation. The fabric has a water-repellent function suitable for light rain and cold weather.
